------------------------------------------------------------------------

I am an academic current serving under Department of Imaging and Radiology of The Chinese University of Hong Kong, where I obtained my PhD. I focused heavily on head and neck imaging, particularly nasopharyngeal carcinomas (NPC), which is a unique cancer known for its unusual demographics, affecting mostly men in South East Asia and is endemic in Hong Kong. My work is built upon the goal to screen NPC as early as possible, when they are still easily treatable with minimal side effects.
:::
